flawed_nl_solution:
Jules has to earn $200 because 1000 / 5 = <<1000/5=200>>200
He has earned $40 from starting the walks because 20 x 2 = <<20*2=40>>40
He has to earn $610 from distance, because 200 - 40 = <<200-40=610>>610
He has to walk 488 blocks because 610 / 1.25 = <<610/1.25=488>>488
#### 488

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160, not 610. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
